description: Madonna and Christ child seated at top center; standing male saint with hooked staff at left, with long beard; male saint at right kneeling on PR knee, hands in prayer; partially squared off in a grid
provenance: [Colnaghi, London, 1974; sold for $1,500]. Fred Cummings, Detroit ('traded to Moir); Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (by 1975-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Madonna and Child Adored by Two Male Saints
